search_context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

results.title: Report a missed bin
results.snippet: If your street has been missed but isn't listed as a known disruption, you can report the missed collection using our online form below.

results.title: Tell us about it
results.snippet: Report something to us. This could be things such as child or adult abuse, missed bins, fly-tipping or potholes.

results.snippet: Report a spilled bin if we've spilled any waste when we were emptying your bins.

Recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin
Key Strengths: Direct link to report a missed bin collection
Informative snippet provides context and instruction
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link offers a direct method for the user to report a missed bin collection, which is essential for the council's customer needs.

Recommendations.Title: Report a spilled bin
Key Strengths: Direct link to report a spilled bin
Informative snippet provides context and instruction
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link offers a direct method for the user to report a spilled bin, which could potentially be related to council customer information needs.

Recommendations.Title: Bins, rubbish and recycling
Key Strengths: Provides a comprehensive overview of bins, rubbish, and recycling services within the council
Includes links to various services such as reporting missed or spilled bins
Recommendations.Reasoning: While not specific to reporting issues, this page provides a comprehensive overview of bins, rubbish, and recycling services within the council which may help users navigate relevant options.

Recommendations.Title: Tell us about it
Key Strengths: A general link to report issues within Barnsley
Includes options to report missed bins and fly-tipping
Recommendations.Reasoning: This page offers a general means for users to report various issues, including the possibility of reporting missed bins and fly-tipping.

Recommendations.Title: Order a bin
Key Strengths: Direct link to order a new bin
Includes information about ordering new bins or replacing damaged ones
Recommendations.Reasoning: While not directly related to reporting issues, this page provides valuable information for users who may need to replace damaged bins.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: The search results yielded several relevant options for council customer information needs. However, some of the links required a deeper level of user navigation beyond the initial title and snippet provided in the data set to fully assess their relevance.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: I prioritized direct links related to reporting missed or spilled bins along with comprehensive resources for bins and recycling given the requirement for relevant options for council customer information needs.

recommendations.Title: Report a missed bin
recommendations.Reasoning: This link offers a direct method for the user to report a missed bin collection, which is essential for the council's customer needs and has the highest confidence score.
